attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is no god, monarchy extant.

ex·tant   Audio Help   /ˈɛkstənt, ɪkˈstænt/ Pronunciation Key - Show Spelled Pronunciation[ek-stuhnt, ik-stant] Pronunciation Key - Show IPA Pronunciation 
–adjective 1. in existence; still existing; not destroyed or lost: There are only three extant copies of the document.  
2. Archaic. standing out; protruding.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
